p: The allocated mice were fasted overnight followed by single oral administration of MEHA (500, 1000 and 2000 mg/kg, body weight). The untreated mice were served as negative control. Mice were checked individually for any physical abnormal behavior and symptoms including allergic syndromes like skin rash, itching, swelling, respiratory complexity and mortality for next 72 h. After that, the mice were euthanized by CO 2 inhalation and were monitored for respiratory cessation and left in the chamber for 1 min after the respiration has stopped.
